name: Sable's Grimoire
description: Sable's Grimoire is a visual novel featuring monster girls in a magic academy setting. Play as Sable, an aspiring magic researcher, as he get sucked into the daily lives and troubles of his demi-human classmates.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP Процессор: 1Ghz Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Место на диске: 500 MB
